text: Table | Repositioning checklist A Airway Endotracheal tube/LMA Patent and in correct position B Breathing Ventilation Pulmonary compliance satisfactory Auscultation Both axillac Monitoring Sao, Capnograph trace and shape C Circulation Monitoring HR/BP/ECG still functioning and readings stable Intravascular lines All still in situ, patent and accessible D Disability/ Eyes Closed and protected neurology Neurovascular Padded vulncrable arcas and avoidance of excessive passive stretch E Exposurc All cables, catheters Checked and removed from the patient/operating table interface and electrodes Access Maintain access for review of at risk arcas if possible
